oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Supertwistor description of the $AdS$ pure spinor string
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramirez, Israel
Vallilo, Brenno Carlini
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We describe the pure spinor string in the $AdS_5\times S^5$ using unconstrained matrices first used by Roiban and Siegel for the Green-Schwarz superstring.
